item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

John Davenport's

John Davenport's is located on one of the top floors of the Omni Hotel in downtown New Haven and offers the best view of our fair little city.

Specials:

$3.00 - John Davenport Amber Ale (draft)
$5.00 - Glass of house Chardonnay or Merlot


Your contact is: Jeanie (203) 494-3518

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - on top of the park
